hero.title: Who We Serve
hero.description: We serve everyone looking for faster, cheaper, and cleaner transportation. From large corporations to individuals, our solutions are designed to fit everyone.

sustainable.title: Driving Towards a
sustainable.description: VEGO is committed to revolutionizing transportation in Saudi Arabia. By providing eco-friendly electric mobility solutions, we are helping businesses and individuals reduce their carbon footprint while improving operational efficiency.

delivery-companies.title: Delivery Companies
delivery-companies.description: We provide electric bikes specialized for daily operations, featuring smart boxes, refrigeration options, and precise tracking systems for faster and more efficient delivery.

logistics-fleets.title: Logistics & Transport Fleets
logistics-fleets.description: The "My VEGO" program for fleet management allows you to monitor vehicle performance, track maintenance, and manage charging all from a single dashboard.

individuals-couriers.title: Individuals & Couriers
individuals-couriers.description: Practical and economical electric bikes, ideal for daily commutes or independent delivery work, offering a cost-effective and green alternative.

municipalities-urban.title: Municipalities & Urban Projects
municipalities-urban.description: Micromobility solutions for cities, residential complexes, and universities. We support sustainability goals and help reduce urban traffic congestion.

restaurants-stores.title: Restaurants & Stores
restaurants-stores.description: Smart electric bikes designed for daily delivery needs, combining efficiency and economy while highlighting your brand’s commercial identity in a sustainable way.

hero.title: Our Branches
hero.description: VEGO starts from the Kingdom to the world, leading the future of electric mobility with smart and sustainable solutions. From our headquarters in Riyadh to our regional and international branches, we continue to expand our presence to deliver our products and services globally.

branches.title: Where We Operate
branches.description: Our network spans regional and international hubs designed to keep VEGO closer to our partners, customers, and supply chains.

cta.title: Connecting the Future of Electric Mobility
cta.description: Our network is growing every day. We are establishing new hubs and service centers across major trade routes to ensure seamless support for our customers worldwide.

commitment-to-excellence.title: Commitment to Excellence
commitment-to-excellence.quality-assurance-desc: Our products meet the highest industry standards and undergo rigorous testing to ensure safety and reliability.
commitment-to-excellence.customer-service-desc: Our relationship extends beyond the purchase, with dedicated support and effective after-sales care.

footer.description: Leading the electric revolution with innovative, sustainable, and high-perforance electric vehicles. Join us in creating a cleaner, greener future.

not-found.not-found-desc: The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist

hero.subtitle: Saudi Arabia's First Electric Mobility Company
hero.title: Innovating the Future of Electric Mobility
hero.description: Integrated solutions combining technology, design, and sustainability to make every journey smarter, cleaner, and more efficient.

who-is-vego.title: Who is VEGO?
who-is-vego.description: The first Saudi company specialized in manufacturing electric mobility solutions globally. Our products include electric motorcycles, smart bikes and scooters, fast charging systems, and the my vego fleet management program, all within one integrated ecosystem.

why-vego-group.title: Why VEGO Group?
why-vego-group.description: Because we innovate the future of electric mobility with solutions that combine technology, design, and sustainability to make every journey smarter, cleaner, and more efficient.
why-vego-group.customer-focus-desc: We craft mobility experiences that stay close to what our customers need most.
why-vego-group.commitment-to-sustainability-desc: Electric solutions that cut emissions and build a cleaner future.
why-vego-group.advanced-technology-desc: Smart innovation that boosts performance and reliability.

what-we-offer.title: What We Offer
what-we-offer.micromobility-desc: A smart urban mobility system using foldable e-bikes and e-scooters to ease short trips and reduce congestion.
what-we-offer.delivery-solutions-desc: Integrated delivery solutions with e-bikes equipped with smart, cooled boxes to ensure fast, efficient delivery.
what-we-offer.electric-motorcycles-desc: Smart electric motorcycles that blend high performance with modern design for smooth, eco-friendly city rides.
what-we-offer.charging-systems-desc: Fast, advanced charging stations that ensure a safe, efficient charging experience for individuals and businesses.

news.title: News
news.news-1-title: VEGO Group showcases the future of e-mobility and launches the micromobility project at Mobility Live 2025
news.news-2-title: VEGO Group and Sweater sign an agreement to advance sustainable e-mobility in Saudi cities
news.news-3-title: VEGO signs a strategic agreement to export 1,000 electric motorcycles to Syria with Beeorder

hero.title: Our Products
hero.subtitle: A refined collection of electric mobility solutions crafted for performance, elegance, and sustainability.

electric-motorcycles.title: Electric Motorcycles
electric-motorcycles.description: The ultimate generation of electric transport combines intelligence, modern technologies, and innovative design to create a leading Saudi industry. VEGO electric motorcycles carry a sustainable future vision powered by smart technology to support the future of intelligent mobility.

delivery-solutions.title: Smart Delivery Solutions
delivery-solutions.intro-1: At VEGO, we provide an integrated ecosystem of intelligent delivery solutions designed to meet the needs of companies and delivery personnel with efficiency and sustainability.
delivery-solutions.intro-2: From electric bicycles equipped with smart and refrigerated boxes, to fast charging systems and fleet management through the My VEGO platform—every element is designed to make delivery operations faster, more economical, and smarter.
delivery-solutions.intro-3: Our solutions combine technology and sustainability to reduce operational costs and enhance service quality, supporting the transformation towards an eco-friendly delivery sector.

micromobility.title: Micromobility Solutions
micromobility.intro-1: Micromobility represents the future of urban transportation, offering smart and eco-friendly solutions that help reduce congestion and lower emissions.
micromobility.intro-2: At VEGO, we provide an integrated ecosystem of electric bikes and scooters designed to meet the needs of individuals and businesses for fast, efficient urban mobility.
micromobility.intro-3: VEGO's micromobility solutions redefine city travel with greater efficiency, flexibility, and a more sustainable experience.

charging-systems.title: Charging Systems
charging-systems.intro-1: At VEGO, we provide comprehensive charging solutions designed to meet a wide range of operational needs, from individual use to large fleets.
charging-systems.intro-2: Our charging systems include three main methods:
charging-systems.home-desc: Safe and convenient charging from any standard electrical outlet, ideal for daily personal use.
charging-systems.fast-desc: Advanced stations that deliver high-speed charging in record time.
charging-systems.swap-desc: Innovative technology that allows replacing a depleted battery with a fully charged one in seconds, ensuring uninterrupted operation.
charging-systems.summary: VEGO’s charging systems are designed to provide flexibility, speed, and sustainability for every journey.
